description.title: Arbitrary Precision Math Library for Complex Numbers
description.paragraph: MPC is a C library for the arithmetic of complex numbers with arbitrarily high precision and correct rounding of the result. It is built upon and follows the same principles as MPFR.
The mingw32-mpc package provides the documentation for the mpc library, as well as the related development files. The associated mingw32-libmpc package provides the C runtime library.
The "doc" component package is obsolete; documentation is now provided in the "info" component package.
There is no longer any useful content in this component package; it may safely be removed.
